thought: The website is accessible, now I need to extract the text from the HTML to look for any characteristics of a scam website.
observation: Retirement Planning for Smart Investors | The Mather Group  Company Careers In the News Tmg family office Client Login Home Why Us Retirement Roadmap Services Financial Planning Executive Services Expat Services Family Office Retiring in the USA Insights Contact Your portfolio grows faster with The Mather Group because our costs are lower than a comparative mutual fund portfolio. We do this by refusing to sell products for commission, and seeking out investments devoid of hidden fees. Our proprietary process explores your lifestyle goals, current financial status, and risk tolerance to help guide an investment approach that achieves your personal vision of retirement success. HOW SMART INVESTORS RETIRE™ Click here for more information about award methodology, any fees paid by TMG, and potential conflicts of interest. Get in touch with us or find one of our office locations The Mather Group Twitter Feed © 2024 The Mather Group. All Rights Reserved. Legal and Important Disclosures Client Relationship Summary How smart investors retire TM MEET THE ADVISORS WITH Meet The Team Low-Cost, Guidance *† Working with The Mather Group means paying for experienced guidance to achieve your unique vision of retirement—we do not receive commissions or hidden fees. HOW WE SAVE YOU MONEY OBJECTIVE Advice on Your Future We are obligated to put your interests first, which means we don't push investment products on you to line our own pockets. Put Your Best Interests First Comprehensive Tax Strategy Included Planning for the future involves important tax considerations, which most of our competitors can’t do. As an independent fiduciary with CPAs on our team, we’re able to provide concrete tax strategies. Plan For The Bigger Picture Your vision of retirement is unique, with many factors to account for in order to reach your goals. We simplify your complex needs with our Retirement Roadmap. Explore Our Roadmap + Smart Retirement Conflict-free Tax Strategy Retirement Planner Our site uses cookies. Please read our Privacy Policy ACCEPT
